title: Game Modes (URF, hexakill etc.)
body:
Just curious, when are we going to see some more game modes again?

Really missing URF and ARURF

replies.body: ARURF is currently on the PBE, so it's likely we'll see it next patch (I'd imagine probably Thursday/Friday of next week, if not as soon as the patch goes live on Wednesday morning).
Never, Riot has discontinued gamemodes for TFT for more money revenue. Go next
